packets.name: Multi-layer vision cloak
packets.author: ToxSam
packets.description:
Tailored by the finest sewing masters in the long lost layer of the Arcane Realm, this cloak grants the power of seeing through various layers of the Metaverse at once.
This were used by the Arcane Realm guards and spies to protect their layer against the dangers of being part of the Metaverse.
Just a few cloaks were sold to outsiders before the Arcane Realm decided to lock themselves forever by closing their all portals to other dimensions.
It is known that this cloak is the only way to contact with the Arcane Realm again, but none has been able to find their layer yet.
